description:
He is often coy about his relationships, and certainly hasn't spoken about his current squeeze.莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥一直对谈感情方面的事很腼腆，所以他总对他的恋情三缄其口。

But there was no denying Leonardo DiCaprio's affections for his Victoria's Secret model girlfriend Toni Garrn as they kissed on the beach in Bora Bora on Friday last week.但现在莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥无疑和维密超模托妮·伽恩陷入热恋，上星期五，他和女朋友在博拉博拉岛的沙滩上深情相吻。

Leo, 39, wore a pair of blue trunks as he held hands with his bikini-clad girlfriend Toni, 21.39岁的莱昂纳多穿着一条蓝色的泳裤，与他那位21岁、穿着比基尼的女友托妮手牵手。

Toni, who has posed topless in her modelling career, took off her bikini shot as she prepared for a day of sunbathing.模特界数一数二的托妮，脱下比基尼准备享受一整天的日光浴。

Later the pair were seen kissing as Toni flung her arms around the Wolf Of Wall Street actor.之后托妮的手臂突然环住莱昂纳多，二个人温柔地亲吻了起来。

小编注：莱昂纳多主演《华尔街之狼》（The Wolf Of Wall Street Actor）

Leo, who has previously romanced a string of well-known beauties, including Gisele Bundchen and Bar Refaeli, recently admitted that he will tie the knot when it feels 'right.'莱昂纳多处处留情，与很多知名美女都有过恋情，比如吉赛尔·邦辰、芭儿·莱法利等等。最近他又表示如果两人的感觉对了，他会考虑结婚。

Asked if a wedding is something he envisages for himself, Academy Award nominee told Gayle King on CBS' This Morning in February: 'The truth is, it's gonna happen when it's gonna happen.'莱昂纳多在两月份曾经被问到过是否曾经考虑过婚姻这件事。他回答：“这件事顺其自然，该发生的时候就会发生。”

'I'm just gonna let it happen naturally. I really am. That's the only way to do it, I feel. And when it's right, it's gonna be right.'“我不会刻意地去结婚，我真的会顺其自然。惟一知道是不是该结婚了的方法就是去感觉，如果感觉对了，结婚也就结对了。”

title: 莱昂纳多与超模女友海滩忘情热吻
